newsitem.title: UK: C&W shares at record high, BT off. [CORRECTED 11:21 GMT]
newsitem.headline: C&W shares at record high, BT off. [CORRECTED 11:21 GMT]

text.p: Shares in Cable and Wireless Plc (corrects company name from "Cable and Wireless Communications Plc") rose to an all-time best on Tuesday, after Hong Kong Telecom powered higher overnight, dealers said.
British Telecommunications shares fell on worries over its merger with MCI ahead of BT's annual shareholders meeting on Wednesday, they said.
At 0953 GMT, C&W shares traded 11p higher at 596-1/2p. BT stock fell 6-1/2p to 450p, topping the most active list and bucking the FTSE 100's jump to a record high.
